pred_ans_conf_MCQ: Prokaryotes reproduce asexually through binary fission, a process in which the cell divides into two identical daughter cells

pred_ans_conf_OE: Prokaryotes reproduce asexually through binary fission, a process in which the cell divides into two identical daughter cells.
